dmca.title: Froogle DMCA complaint - Net Enforcer20 - Klipsch
dmca.body:
Tue, 15 Aug 2006 14:21:48 -0400

Attn: Legal, DMCA complaints
 

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named  Klipsch ("IP Owner"). I have a good faith belief that the listings or materials listed below are not authorized by the above IP Owner, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or United States law. Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing.
 

Identity of advertisement(s) at issue/Images owned by Klipsch:
 
Hifi Sound                    KL-525-THX
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.hifisound.de/oxid/out/oxbaseshop/html/0/dyn_images/1/KLI-5004182.jpg&size=2&dhm=864e76ff&hl=en
 
 Hifi Sound                   F-2
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.hifisound.de/oxid/out/oxbaseshop/html/0/dyn_images/1/KLI-5004015.jpg&size=2&dhm=58ca4d60&hl=en
 
Vogue And Beyond      SF-1
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.vogueandbeyond.com/catalog/L10077340.jpg&size=2&dhm=484125f&hl=en
 
 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that, for each image identified above, I either own the copyright or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 

Printed Name: Chase R. Riggins
Title & Company:  Enforcement Team, Net Enforcers, Inc.
Street Address:  P.O. Box 9006
City and State:  Coral Springs, FL
Zip:  33075
Email:  CRiggins@netenforcers.com
Fax: 954.827.2381
Date:  8/15/06
 
Truthfully,
Chase R. Riggins
